contents.text: Thank you for calling Kleiner Perkins, San Francisco venture capital partners investing in bold founders from inception to IPO and beyond.
For inquiries regarding our existing portfolio companies, press 1.
To reach your Kleiner Perkins partner, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to your partner. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: Connect me directly to my Kleiner Perkins partner for a quick update
Discuss my veteran-focused startup's progress with my Kleiner Perkins partner
Sync with my Kleiner Perkins partner to review our Q2 performance metrics and discuss scaling our microservices architecture.
I’d like to speak with my Kleiner Perkins partner about updates on my existing portfolio company.
I need to speak with my Kleiner Perkins partner about a potential research collaboration with one of your portfolio companies.

contents.text: For accounting or billing questions, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to our finance team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing question on my account statement
Ask finance for details on the recent funding disbursement to my veteran-support company
Get clarification on the latest invoice—specifically reconcile the expense codes and billing cycle for our cloud infrastructure usage.
I need help understanding and paying my recent billing statement from Kleiner Perkins.
I have a question about my recent invoice for data analysis services from one of your portfolio startups.

contents.text: If you are an entrepreneur seeking funding for a new venture, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our investment intake team.

navigationGoals: Submit my initial pitch deck for venture funding
Submit an initial pitch deck for my veteran-owned venture to Kleiner Perkins
Submit an initial pitch deck for our AI-driven SaaS startup focusing on real-time data analytics.
I want to submit my initial pitch for a new business idea to Kleiner Perkins.
I’d like to submit my initial pitch for my quantum computing startup.

contents.text: To learn about our investment criteria, press 2.
One moment please, transferring you to our investment criteria specialist.

navigationGoals: Get details on Kleiner Perkins’ investment criteria
Inquire about Kleiner Perkins' investment criteria for veteran-led early-stage startups
Discuss Kleiner Perkins' investment criteria, including preferred check sizes, traction benchmarks, and sector focus.
I’d like to ask what Kleiner Perkins looks for when evaluating new investment opportunities.
I want to learn about your investment criteria for deep tech ventures in applied physics.
